channel.title: How do i add more mempry to server so more people can login
channel.description:
people are trting to log in and it says "david cant log in becaue too much players/out of memory."
--SAYS THAT IN RUN.bat

item.title: How do i add more mempry to server so more people can login
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Maybe x blitx x is right, try opening up your PlayerHandler.java and search for public static final int maxPlayers = #; Really, you don’t need to search, it should be at the top of the playerhandler. Change or edit that number sign to whatever amount you want. Just change your old number and post here what the number was.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add more mempry to server so more people can login
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Has anybody even thought that the Max players integer has been reached and is blocking people from logging in?
Hense the part of

david cant log in becaue [b]too much players[/b]/out of memory.

item.title: How do i add more mempry to server so more people can login
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:9, topic:249918”][quote author=Efilite link=topic=329469.msg2575437#msg2575437 date=1228940400]

Can i ask what mempry is?

One little type mistake and you got to cause spam, you know what will happen next, someone will quote this and say something unnecessary.
[/quote]
Like you i guess. Cry Yourself A River, Build a Bridge and get over it![/quote]

Naww, I’ll have to agree with Efilite on this one, that was a stupid post. You post on his topic, yet, made no attempt to even help him. Way to spam. Anyways, `Rich is probably right though, you might need a new computer or just an external hard drive or something to add into your computer.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add more mempry to server so more people can login
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

`Rich:

Get a new computer, or buy a dedicated server.

It can actually be the batch problem.
If there is something like 256M in your run.bat, change it to 760. It would work fine, if there’s nothing there then your computer has run out of memory and will not let any other players log on in till you have end some processes that you don’t need running.

Read full topic
